3 namespace Ubiquity\cache\system;

5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UFileSystem;
6 use Ubiquity\exceptions\CacheException;
7 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheFile;
8 
18 class ArrayCache extends AbstractDataCache {
23  private $_fileMode;
24 
32  public function __construct($root, $postfix = "", $cacheParams = []) {
33  parent::__construct ( $root, $postfix );
34  $this->_fileMode = (isset ( $cacheParams ["fileMode"] )) ? $cacheParams ["fileMode"] : 0755;
35  if (! is_dir ( $root ))
36  \mkdir ( $root, $this->_fileMode, true );
37  }
38 
45  public function exists($key) {
46  return file_exists ( $this->_getPath ( $key ) );
47  }
48 
56  protected function storeContent($key, $content, $tag) {
57  $path = $this->_getPath ( $key );
58  $dir = pathinfo ( $path, PATHINFO_DIRNAME );
59  if (UFileSystem::safeMkdir ( $dir )) {
60  if (@\file_put_contents ( $path, $content, LOCK_EX ) === false) {
61  throw new CacheException ( "Unable to write cache file: {$path}" );
62  }
63  if (@\chmod ( $path, $this->_fileMode ) === false) {
64  throw new CacheException ( "Unable to set permissions of cache file: {$path}" );
65  }
66  } else {
67  throw new CacheException ( "Unable to create folder : {$dir}" );
68  }
69  }
70 
77  public function fetch($key) {
78  return include ($this->_getPath ( $key ));
79  }
80 
87  public function file_get_contents($key) {
88  return \file_get_contents ( $this->_getPath ( $key ) );
89  }
90 
97  public function getTimestamp($key) {
98  return \filemtime ( $this->_getPath ( $key ) );
99  }
100 
107  private function _getPath($key) {
108  return $this->_root . $key . $this->postfix . '.php';
109  }
110 
116  public function remove($key) {
117  $file = $this->_getPath ( $key );
118  if (\file_exists ( $file ))
119  return \unlink ( $file );
120  return false;
121  }
122 
128  public function clear($matches = "") {
129  $files = glob ( $this->_root . $matches . '*' );
130  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
131  if (\is_file ( $file ))
132  \unlink ( $file );
133  }
134  }
135 
141  public function getCacheFiles($type) {
142  return CacheFile::initFromFiles ( $this->_root . $type, \ucfirst ( $type ), function ($file) use ($type) {
143  $file = \basename ( $file );
144  return $type . \DS . substr ( $file, 0, strpos ( $file, $this->postfix . '.php' ) );
145  } );
146  }
147 
153  public function clearCache($type) {
154  CacheFile::delete ( $this->_root . \strtolower ( $type ) );
155  }
156 
162  public function getCacheInfo() {
163  $result = parent::getCacheInfo ();
164  $result .= "<br>Root cache directory is <b>" . UFileSystem::cleanPathname ( $this->_root ) . "</b>.";
165  return $result;
166  }
167 
173  public function getEntryKey($key) {
174  return UFileSystem::cleanFilePathname ( $this->_getPath ( $key ) );
175  }
176 
182  public function setRoot($root) {
183  $this->_root = rtrim ( $root, \DS ) . \DS;
184  }
185 }
